, Malaise B 9 , N.W. Perioto & equip ecol. ( MZSP ).
Variations . Head longer, temple profile parallel, scrobal carina stronger and inclined.
Distribution . Brazil (Amapá, Amazonas, Pará, Rondônia, Paraná, *Roraima, *Espírito Santo, Rio de Janeiro,*São Paulo).
